item.description:
SUMMER SHABBAT AT SUNSET NEW EVENT
TC: Dwight (djarrat@hotmail.com)
EVENT: A friendly, song-filled Friday Night service and Oneg Shabbat for ages 30s, 40s, and 50s, Single and Married (and younger and older). Refreshments will be served! A great way to meet new people - over 75 people attended the June "Summer Shabbat at Sunset"! Organized by Arnie Glick and Dwight Jarret, services led by Hal Katzman.
MEET: Congregation Kehillath Israel (KI), 384 Harvard Street, Brookline
TIME: 8:00 PM
For more info you may also call Diane at the KI Office (617) 277-9155

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: SUMMER SHABBAT AT SUNSET
